channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tom Brady to Patriots Owner Robert Kraft: 'Get That 7th Ring So We Can Match'
item.description: Tom Brady made it abundantly clear who he's pulling for in Super Bowl LX between the Seattle Seahawks and New England Patriots.

item.title: Former Los Angeles Dodgers Star Yasiel Puig Faces 20 Years in Federal Prison
item.description: Former Los Angeles Dodgers star Yasiel Puig was found guilty of obstruction and faces 20 years in federal prison.

item.title: 2026 NFL Offseason Buzz, Rumors: Chiefs Star Travis Kelce Coming Back?
item.description: The NFL offseason hasn't officially arrived yet, but 30 teams are already looking ahead to 2026. Here's the latest offseason buzz and rumors around th...

item.title: Rick Pitino to St. John's Star Zuby Ejiofor: 'You're Going to Make Me Retire'
item.description: Rick Pitino was all smiles with his star big man, Zuby Ejiofor, after No. 22 St. John's upset No. 3 UConn on Friday night.

item.title: 4 Takeaways From St. John's Upset Win Over UConn
item.description: St. John’s completed an upset of No. 3 UConn, 81-72, to snap the Huskies’ 18-game winning streak and reopen the Big East race.

item.title: Men's Bubble Watch: Who made or hurt their tourney case this weekend?
item.description: How are your team's chances to make the Big Dance shaping up in the final six weeks until Selection Sunday?

item.title: Bracketology watch guide: Expect a lot of bracket movement this weekend
item.description: Duke and North Carolina renew their rivalry (6:30 p.m. ET on ESPN), and a busy weekend has the chance to tighten the race for the top seeds in men's h...

item.title: Sixty bets for Super Bowl 60
item.description: We navigated the thousands of bets being offered for Super Bowl LX and narrowed it down to our 60 favorite from 10 different categories.

item.title: Von Allmen wins downhill, 1st gold of Milan Cortina
item.description: Swiss racer Franjo von Allmen captured the Olympic downhill Saturday to win the first gold medal at the Milan Cortina Games.

item.title: That was fast: Next Gen Stats already a part of Super Bowl betting
item.description: YAC, air yards, fastest player speed. Seth Walder looks at Next Gen Stats props and names his top overall play.
